main_text.sentence: Good sensitivity and specificity for detecting depression in geriatric psychiatric and medical outpatients has been demonstrated (84–100% sensitivity; 73–96% specificity) [60,61].
These data include evidence for splice variation effecting calcium and voltage sensitivity, surface expression, and sensitivity to protein phosphorylation of the maxi-K channel [16,17]; [18].
In 4 cases however (ARC18, PDE2, PEX6 and SPF1), we found a wild type sensitivity for mutants that had previously shown altered Calcofluor white sensitivity [22,42,58,59].
The sensitivity of the questionnaire has been established [21].
